title: Bottle

claims.preamble: I claim the ornamental design for a bottle, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front perspective view of the bottle showing my design.
FIG. 2 is a front elevation view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a back view thereof;
FIG. 5 is an opposite side view thereof;
FIG. 6 is a top plan view thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a bottom view thereof.
The broken line text is presented for illustrative purposes only and forms no part of the claimed design.
